quote_last: , an announcement came over the loudspeaker. “All those involved in the Cartwright case, please make their way back in to court number four, as the jury is returning.”
title: A Prisoner of Birth
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_first: Perhaps those three miles were nearer four, because when, tired, dusty, and heart-sick, he described the tower of the Congregational church above the leafless elms and maples of the village, the gilded hands pointed to
title: The Turner Twins
author: Ralph Henry Barbour
